titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that any Social Security reform legislation should include a "Community Bank Option".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 4/12/2005--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that any Social Security reform legislation should include a "Community Bank Option."
